attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With hugely negative opinion polls and loss of the Glasgow East by-election it is time that the prime minister listened to the country and did what is right by standing down. For this to be a democratic society the government has to listen to the people even when it goes against their own intentions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
